resources.string: John would like to swap his Wednesday evening shift with your Saturday evening shift
Below are offered shift swaps,\ntap for aye or bin for naw.
Below are your shift swap requests.
Below are your pending shift requests, tap to accept or reject.
Tap on a date to see your shifts on that day
Tap below to select a shift to swap you shift on %1$s with.
You can request a swap request by tapping on it below
